---
category: news
title: "AI will 'lead to more games being made and more jobs'"
excerpt: "Dr Richard Wilson, boss of TIGA, says AI will \"reduce the cost of making games and speed up the process\". Video games have been using forms of artificial intelligence for decades. But use of the latest technology in games creation is concerning some who worry that it could cost jobs and create legal issues for studios."
